meanings.sent1: She parles with kindness to everyone.
meanings.sent2: He parles with confidence during presentations.
meanings.sent3: The cat parles with the birds in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The wind parles softly through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The teacher parles clearly to help students understand.

meanings.sent1: Their parle was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy a good parle with friends over coffee.
meanings.sent3: The parle between the two dogs sounded like music.
meanings.sent4: The parle of the leaves in the wind was soothing.
meanings.sent5: The parle at the party was lively and engaging.

meanings.sent1: Their parle about the movie lasted for hours.
meanings.sent2: The parle at the meeting was productive.
meanings.sent3: The parle of the toys in the playroom was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The parle of the river with the rocks was constant.
meanings.sent5: The parle of the birds in the morning was cheerful.
